name: Date Validation Action Tags
description: Action tags to validate date and date time entries as @FUTURE, @NOTPAST, @PAST, @NOTFUTURE.

action-tags.description:
For a date (or datetime) field, uses today + 1 (or now) as range minimum.
Current date (time) is NOT within the allowed range.
For a date (or datetime) field, equivalent to using today (or now) as range minimum.

For a date (or datetime) field, uses today - 1 (or now) as range maximum.
Current date (time) is NOT within the allowed range.
For a date (or datetime) field, equivalent to using today (or now) as range maximum.
